importantArticles.headline: MARA Holdings (NasdaqCM:MARA) experienced a significant share price movement, rising 13% over the last week. This increase came on the heels of MARA Holdings announcing the appointment of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP as its new independent registered public accounting firm, succeeding Marcum LLP. Despite the market's modest 1.8% rise during the same period, MARA's performance seems particularly strong, potentially reflecting investor confidence following recent notable earnings growth. importantArticles.headline: Yahoo Finance Anchor Seana Smith outlines what investors need to know mid-trading session in today's Market Minute. Tesla (TSLA) stock tumbles on weak European sales data, sending the electric vehicle (EV) maker's market capitalization below $1 trillion and leading the "Magnificient Seven" into correction territory. At Apple's (AAPL) annual shareholder meeting, investors voted to maintain the iPhone maker's diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) initiatives amid political pressure from the Trump administration. Bitcoin (BTC-USD) hit its lowest point in three months, dragging crypto stocks like Coinbase (COIN), Riot (RIOT), and MARA Holdings (MARA) lower. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute. This post was written by Naomi Buchanan.
importantArticles.title: Tesla, Apple's DEI vote, bitcoin declines: Market Minute
